parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - HTML </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the <tt>sizeEx</tt> property for most controls as follows: 
* <tt>CT_MAP</tt> - "sizeExNames"
* <tt>CT_STRUCTURED_TEXT</tt> - "size" (since Arma 3 v2.01)
* <tt>CT_HTML</tt> - "P" >> "sizeEx"
* Other - "sizeEx"
For getter command see [[ctrlFontHeight]]</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> control '''ctrlSetFontHeight''' size 

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> size: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[ctrlSetFontHeight]] 0.05;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Arma: GUI Configuration]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
